member.name: IMFMediaEngineSrcElements.AddElement
member.summary: Adds a source element to the end of the list.
member.param: The URL of the source element, or NULL.
The MIME type of the source element, or NULL.
A media-query string that specifies the intended media type, or NULL. If specified, the string should conform to the W3C Media Queries specification.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineSrcElements.GetLength
member.summary: Gets the number of source elements in the list.
member.returns: Returns the number of source elements.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineSrcElements.GetMedia
member.summary: Gets the intended media type of an element in the list.
member.param: The zero-based index of the source element. To get the number of source elements, call .
Receives a BSTR that contains a media-query string. The caller must free the BSTR by calling SysFreeString. If no media type is set, this parameter receives the value NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineSrcElements.GetType
member.summary: Gets the MIME type of an element in the list.
member.param: The zero-based index of the source element. To get the number of source elements, call .
Receives a BSTR that contains the MIME type. The caller must free the BSTR by calling SysFreeString. If no MIME type is set, this parameter receives the value NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineSrcElements.GetURL
member.summary: Gets the URL of an element in the list.
member.param: The zero-based index of the source element. To get the number of source elements, call .
Receives a BSTR that contains the URL of the source element. The caller must free the BSTR by calling SysFreeString. If no URL is set, this parameter receives the value NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineSrcElements.RemoveAllElements
member.summary: Removes all of the source elements from the list.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineSrcElements
member.summary: Provides the Media Engine with a list of media resources.
